page.title: 15RECREATION
page.content: Recreation in the villages of Sheepy Magna and Sibson is self made. Cricket and football matches, and social events organised by the various village clubs are held in the village hall or school. Events include fetes, dances,musical entertainment and whist drives. The lack of recreation facilities possibly effects the teenagers of the villages most, although they do participate in the general village events and parents provide transport whenever needed. The villages are served by a mobile library and chiropodist but for further health services residents must travel outside the area to Atherstone or Market Bosworth. For shopping and more sophisticated entertainments the larger towns and cities of the Midlands are within easy reach of the area.
